[vc_row][vc_column]

Automatic Stretch Blow Molding Machines

[vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]WASHUN Machinery has decades experience for designing and manufacturing the most comprehensive two-stage reheat stretch blow moulding machines that meets the wide range of industrial needs: from small 0.1 liter bottles to large 5 gallon bottles. Our R&D team’s commitments to efficiency runs through out the blow moulding machines design, for example, the revolutionary preform reheat unit and optimized blowing station. We focus on innovation and quality to provide high performance, reliable blow moulding machines for maximizing the performance of the machines.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”4399″ img_size=”full” style=”vc_box_outline” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://www.megamachinery.com/portfolio/rotary-blow-moulding-machines/”]

[vc_column_text]RB Series is the latest Rotary Blow Moulding Machine from WASHUN Machinery. MG-SS2W Blow Moulding Machine for PET Can
